short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for certain flexible hoses
description: The Department of National Defence requires the following items: eleven different types of hose assemblies described with part numbers, brands and quantities needing delivery to two different CFBs in Canada. The procurement is competitive and open to bidding. \

full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Request for Proposal
The Department of National Defence has announced a request for proposals (RFP) for the procurement of non-metallic flexible hose assemblies.

#### Tender Overview

* **Reference Number**: CB-824-72221572
* **Solicitation Number**: W8482-253118/A
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 23, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: February 21, 2025
* **Expected Contract End Date**: November 10, 2025
* **Tender Status**: Open

#### Procurement Details

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the procurement of the following non-metallic flexible hose assemblies:

* 16 units of hose sets (GSIN: N4720, NSN: 21-9109663)
* 7 units of hose assembly sets (GSIN: N4720, NSN: 01-3981643)
* 7 units of hose sets (GSIN: N4720, NSN: 21-9109665)
* 7 units of hose sets (GSIN: N4720, NSN: 21-9109666)
* 7 units of hose sets (GSIN: N4720, NSN: 21-9109668)
* 12 units of hose assemblies (GSIN: N4720, NSN: 21-9109678)

These hose assemblies are required for delivery to Canadian Forces Base Esquimalt, British Columbia, and Canadian Forces Base Halifax, Nova Scotia.

#### Bidding Requirements

* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars only.
* Equivalent or substitute products must be indicated by brand name and model, part number, and NCAGE.
* Binding bids must be submitted electronically in either English or French.

#### Contracting Entity

* **Name**: Directorate Maritime Procurement
* **Address**: 101 Colonel by Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada
* **Contact**: Jean-Pierre Normandin, Email: [Jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca), Phone: (819) 939-3674

#### Tender Documents

Tender documents, including the Request for Proposal (RFP), can be accessed through the [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) website.
